thread.title: iPhone users: Test drive a Samsung Galaxy S Edge for 30 days for $1
thread.title_full: iPhone users: Test drive a Samsung Galaxy S Edge for 30 days for $1

author: Doreen Christensen
title: iPhone users: Test drive a Samsung Galaxy S Edge for 30 days for $1
text:
iPhone users: Test drive a Samsung Galaxy S Edge for 30 days for $1 Cell phone data throttled? Here's what to do 
When AT&T, Verizon, Sprint and T-Mobile put your high-speed unlimited data plan in the super-slow-mo lane, fight back with these tips and tricks. 
When AT&T, Verizon, Sprint and T-Mobile put your high-speed unlimited data plan in the super-slow-mo lane, fight back with these tips and tricks. Doreen Christensen Contact Reporter Sun Sentinel Test drive a Samsung Galaxy 6S S Edge, 6S Edge+ or Note 5 for $1. 
iPhone users curious how the new Samsung devices compare to your Apple hardware, then here's a risk-free chance to find out. 
Current iPhone users can take a new Galaxy 6S S Edge, 6S Edge+ or Note 5 smartphone for a month-long test drive for one dollar. 
The no-obligation offer is only for iPhone users with active service on Verizon, AT&T, T-Mobile and Sprint. 
Use your active iPhone and a credit card to order the kit with the new phone, SIM card and instructions to set it up. 
As a bonus, if you switch to the new Android, you'll get a $100 credit on Google Play. Trade in your old phone to a carrier or retailer for another $100 credit.
